title: It's time for an update
content:
There are several known bugs in v2.5.0 - v2.5.4. If you are experiencing any of the following, please update to v2.5.5 to resolve them:
  - Auto-save doesn't work
  - Cannot adjust frame duration
  - Layer row being shifted to the right
  - Brush/eraser sometimes doesn't draw single-pixel tap

Even if you have not encountered any of these issues, updating is also recommended to get the latest features.
